name: responsive-mq
author: Keith Jackson
description: Responsive MQ has been designed to enable you to attach JavaScript functions to media queries so you can have viewport specific code executing within your app to partner up with your responsive CSS.

scripts.warn-win: echo The Windows scripts have not been fully tested and may need an update...
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run ensure-dir && npm run uglify && npm run copy-readme && npm run copy-package-json
scripts.build-win: npm run warn-win && npm run clean-win && npm run ensure-dir && npm run uglify && npm run copy-readme-win && npm run copy-package-json-win
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run publish-to-npm && npm run build-tar-for-github
scripts.release-win: npm run lint && npm run build-win && npm run publish-to-npm
